TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ApplicationQueuingAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ApplicationQueuingAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ApplicationQueuingAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 針對標記的組件啟用佇列支援，並且讓應用程式能夠從訊息佇列的佇列讀取方法呼叫。

span.span: Enables queuing support for the marked assembly and enables the application to read method calls from Message Queuing queues.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. 如需使用屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用型別。The following code example demonstrates the use of the type. summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否啟用佇列支援。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether queuing support is enabled.

value.span: 如果啟用佇列支援，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if queuing support is enabled; otherwise, .

value.span: 建構函式設定的預設值為 。

span.span: The default value set by the constructor is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式不能使用預設的已排入佇列的元件。Applications are not able to use queued components by default. 具現化可讓應用程式使用已排入佇列元件; 不過，不會啟用應用程式以接聽來自用戶端已排入佇列的訊息。Instantiating enables an application to use queued components; however, it does not enable the application to listen for queued messages from clients. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例取得和設定的值`ApplicationQueuing`屬性的屬性。The following code example gets and sets the value of an `ApplicationQueuing` attribute's property. [!code-csharp[EnterpriseServicesApplicationQueuingAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServicesApplicationQueuingAttribute/CS/class1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[EnterpriseServicesApplicationQueuingAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServicesApplicationQueuingAttribute/VB/class1.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxListenerThreads { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.MaxListenerThreads : int with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定用來從佇列擷取訊息並啟動對應元件的執行緒數目。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of threads used to extract messages from the queue and activate the corresponding component.

value.span: 用來處理到達佇列中之訊息的執行緒最大數目。

span.span: The maximum number of threads to use for processing messages arriving in the queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的有效範圍是 0 到 1000 之間。The valid range for this property is 0 to 1000. 預設值是零。The default is zero. 新建立的應用程式中，設定衍生自目前用來決定預設接聽程式的執行緒數目的演算法： 16 倍的 Cpu 數目在伺服器中。For a newly created application, the setting is derived from the algorithm currently used for determining the default number of listener threads: 16 times the number of CPUs in the server. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < `QcListenerMaxThreads` 中[應用程式 （COM +）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/cossdk/html/c0c46592-5282-412d-8f54-67637be8218a.asp)。For more information, see `QcListenerMaxThreads` in [Applications (COM+)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/cossdk/html/c0c46592-5282-412d-8f54-67637be8218a.asp). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例取得和設定的值`ApplicationQueuing`屬性的屬性。The following code example gets and sets the value of an `ApplicationQueuing` attribute's property.
